```
wolves = input("Enter the number of wolves: ")
enoughWolves = wolves > 10 and wolves < 20
print("Enough wolves: " + str(enoughWolves))
```

```
wolves = input("Enter the number of wolves: ")
enoughWolves = 10 < wolves < 20
print("Enough wolves: " + str(enoughWolves))
```

```
wolves = input("Enter the number of wolves: ")
enoughWolves = 10 <= wolves <= 20
print("Enough wolves: " + str(enoughWolves))
```
